title: I feel my E586DS getting hot after long hours usage. Is there safety concern?
answer: Like most other electronic devices, E586DS get hotter during charge or big data transfer. It is a quite normal phenomenon if working in regular office environment. Even if it work in hot environment, E586DS will automatically power off if its temperature reach 157 ℉(69 ℃) for safety protection. (Please don’t use E586DS in close environment; it will cause poor signal and high heat of your E586DS)
